ModMetaData.name: Colonist Bar KF 1.1
ModMetaData.author: Killface
ModMetaData.description:
More options for the Colonist Bar, including new status icons and a mood bar.
Allows custom scaling and sorting functionality. All options available with Right Mouse Button click on any colonist portrait. FollowMe™ functionality via Middle Mouse Button click.
Includes icon stats based on 'Pawn State Icons™' by Dan Sadler Includes 'FollowMe™' functionality by Fluffy with updated code by alexschrod (Needed for more mouse button options. Please deactivate Fluffy's original version in case of any conflicts.) Includes 'ZoomToMouse™' functionality by Fluffy (cause I like it and it wasn't updated a few RW alphas back)
